Package com.lyit.csd.domain

Class Asset

java.lang.Object
com.lyit.csd.domain.Asset
public class Asset extends Object
Asset class to store relevant market info on held assets.

    • Asset

      public Asset(String assetSymbol, long purchaseDateTime, double purchaseUnits, double purchasePrice, MarketClient marketClient)
      Asset constructor.
      Parameters:
      assetSymbol - Stock sticker of asset
      purchaseDateTime - Date asset was purchased
      purchaseUnits - Number of units purchased in order
      purchasePrice - Price units were purchased at
      marketClient - Market client to be used during purchase.
